title: The Bistro on the Waterfront
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Caribbean, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. During the day there's a veggie burger, salad (omit feta, added tofu), crispy tofu caprese burger (has cheese). At dinner there's a local green papaya salad and a Vetnamese spiced crispy rice flour crepe.
